text: Nɨ deraghvɨra uan arazibagh nɨghnighɨva, Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn aven mangɨ. Puram aven mangan markɨ. Nɨ fofozim iniasava aven zui. Egh gumazir mabar mɨn puram ofabar amuan markɨ, mati gumazim fofoziba puvatɨghava dagh ami. Kamaghɨn amir gumazamiziba, me deragha fozir pu, bizir manam Godɨn damazimɨn dera.
